promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a gigantic basic frilled-lizard water-type wearing teal and navy bracers. It can be found in river-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or frilled-lizard. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Tealygo, a gigantic basic frilled-lizard water-type pokemon. It can be found in river-like environments It has the following abilities: bubble. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word frilled-lizard or water or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, frilled-lizard-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, aurora background
generatedDescription: Tealygo loves to sunbathe in river-like habitats. Its glittering scales dazzle onlookers! It can spew bubbles to fight its foes.
